engisfarm

Class LivingThing

  • java.lang.Object
    • engisfarm.LivingThing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FarmAnimal, Player

    public abstract class LivingThing
extends java.lang.Object
    LivingThing adalah kelas abstrak yang merepresentasikan makhluk hidup berupa Player dan FarmAnimal
